name: Giant Slayer
description: Ancient giants have awakened from their
eternal slumber and now threaten to
Face these colossal beings in combat
and prove that even the mightiest giants
can be brought low by courage and skill.

dialogs.start1: Giants walk the earth again! This hasn't happened in centuries!
dialogs.start2: Their massive footsteps shake the very mountains.
dialogs.start3: Legend speaks of those brave enough to face giants in combat.
dialogs.progress1: Those tracks belong to an ancient stone giant, no doubt.
dialogs.progress2: Knowledge is power when facing beings of such immense size.
dialogs.complete1: Incredible! You've slain giants - creatures of legend!
dialogs.complete2: Tales of your giant-slaying prowess will be told for generations.
